title: Clone of a cinnabon
ingredients: ['For the dough', '250ml (8 fl oz) warm milk (45 C)', '2 eggs, room temperature', '75g (3 oz) butter, melted', '600g (1 1/3 lb) bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons quick yeast', 'For the filling', '225g (8 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '75g (3 oz) butter, softened', 'For the icing', '100g (4 oz) cream cheese, softened', '50g (2 oz) butter, softened', '200g (7 oz) icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1/8 teaspoon salt']
